title: Mid meta for this season?
body: Seeming as assassins are anti-fun (who likes dying amirite) Riot is basically nerfing them all this season so I was wondering what will take there place will we return to poke champs like Ziggs/Xerath or maybe more team fight oriented champs interested to see which way the meta goes and devastated that league of assassins is coming to an end :C

replies.body:
I'll sit on mid with my only mid laner

Karthus xd
Fk da assasins, i just farm and wait for mid game.
Its sounds so simple because im in trash elo.

Ziggs has been disgustingly strong since forever. He should see play, maybe even in LCS/OGN etc. Xerath is fairly strong, will probably also rise in popularity, as a jungle main, I'm okay with this.

Poke mids will probably be more popular which might see champs like yasuo/talon/fizz being picked as counters.
Syndra/Ori is always a good pick.
